messages:
Name: Ramzi Safuri
Nationality: Israel
Date of Birth: October 21, 1995
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Hapoel Be'er Sheva
Ligat ha'Al clubs played for: Hapoel Tel Aviv, Bnei Sakhnin, Hapoel Ashkelon, Maccabi Netanya, Hapoel Be'er Sheva
Hapoel Be'er Sheva's Ramzi Safuri hasn't been involved in any of the 36 games that his side have played in the Ligat ha'Al so far in 2019/2020.

Safuri last appeared in the competition on April 3 for Maccabi Netanya versus Maccabi Tel Aviv. In that game the Israeli player scored for his team in their 4-1 win. In total, the midfielder has scored three Ligat ha'Al goals in 2019/2020.
His opening goals of the campaign came in the  against  on .
Safuri played 27 Ligat ha'Al games last season for Hapoel Tel Aviv and scored eight goals.
Safuri switched to Hapoel Be'er Sheva in July 2019 from Hapoel Tel Aviv, for whom he made 92 league appearances in total, scoring 16 goals.
